name: Falling (Augustto)
description:
Falling is an horror-adventure game entirely developed by Augusto Salgado (aka me) for the "Senscape adventurous game jam", in it's 2022 year edition.

My portfolio: http://augustos.com.ar/
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/augusto-salgado/
Instagram: @augustosalgadoo
Email: augustosalgador@gmail.com

---------

CREDITS:

Directed by Augusto Salgado

Augusto Salgado

Augusto Salgado
